RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa and the United States
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Plea Agreement: Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa and the United States
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Plea Agreement Addendum: Plea Agreement Addendum between Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa and the United States
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States District Court for the: United States District Court for the Southern District of Texas's finding that Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa understood the nature of a voluntary plea

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's Affidavit: Document submitted by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa claiming he did not understand the Plea Agreement, found to be contradicted by the record
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Agreement outlining terms of guilty plea, including waiver of right to collaterally attack conviction or sentence, signed by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: Defendant who pleaded guilty to charges of illegal re-entry after deportation, native and citizen of Mexico, made statements under oath during plea colloquy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement Addendum between Rogelio: Addendum to the Plea Agreement, outlining additional terms or conditions, including waiver of right to appeal sentence imposed, signed by Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court for the Sou: Court finding that defendant fully understands the charges, penalties, and his rights, based on his statements at plea colloquy
